name: Chase the Wind
description:
Description Fly through vivid scenery and take advantage of the wind to deliver a friend's message!

Chase the Wind is a game created by first year students at The Game Assembly. Control a paper plane that flies through the streets of a japanese city, collecting the letters on your way and avoid the obstacles in order to reach your destination.

Tutorial Credits Programming

Miguel Blix Manuel
Jenny Eriksson
Mathias Perez Bustos
Nathalie Tuovinen
Marcus Åkesson Schornack 

Level Design
